summary.content: Do you guys happen to remember BuyMusic.com and all of the fuss from the web standards community this past summer? Well, according to the guys over at As the Apple Turns, it appears that the BuyMusic.com experiment was a complete and utter failure. Are we suprised? We think not. I suppose it was a bad idea to lock out users of Mozilla, Opera, Safari, Linux, MacOS, and other technologically advanced groups of people.

content.html:
Do you guys happen to remember BuyMusic.com and all of the fuss from the web standards community this past summer?

Well, according to the guys over at As the Apple Turns, it appears that the BuyMusic.com experiment was a complete and utter failure. Are we suprised? We think not.

I suppose it was a bad idea to lock out users of Mozilla, Opera, Safari, Linux, MacOS, and other technologically advanced groups of people.
content.plain:
Do you guys happen to remember BuyMusic.com and all of the fuss from the web standards community this past summer?
Well, according to the guys over at As the Apple Turns, it appears that the BuyMusic.com experiment was a complete and utter failure. Are we suprised? We think not.
I suppose it was a bad idea to lock out users of Mozilla, Opera, Safari, Linux, MacOS, and other technologically advanced groups of people.
content.source:
Do you guys happen to remember [BuyMusic.com]({{% wayback "http://www.buymusic.com" %}}) and all of the [fuss]({{% wayback "http://www.webstandards.org/buzz/archive/2003_07.html#a000169" %}}) [from the]({{% wayback "http://www.macnn.com/news/20350" %}}) [web]({{% wayback "http://www.zeldman.com/daily/0703b.shtml#outoftune" %}}) [standards]({{% wayback "http://www.dionidium.com/2003/07/00090" %}}) [community]({{% wayback "http://speed.insane.com/archives/2003/07/24/i_wont_buymusiccom.php" %}}) this past summer?

Well, according to the guys over at [As the Apple Turns]({{% wayback "http://www.appleturns.com/scene/?id=4599" %}}), it appears that the BuyMusic.com experiment was a [complete]({{% wayback "http://www.macnn.com/news/20400&startNumber=46" %}}) and [utter failure]({{% wayback "http://www.usatoday.com/tech/news/2003-07-28-buymusic_x.htm" %}}). Are we suprised? We think not.

I suppose it was a bad idea to lock out users of Mozilla, Opera, Safari, Linux, MacOS, and other technologically advanced groups of people.
